name: StringUtil_appendNormalisedWhitespaceTest
description: Unit tests for the appendNormalisedWhitespace method in StringUtil.

test_cases.name: testAppendNormalisedWhitespace
test_cases.description: Tests the appendNormalisedWhitespace method in StringUtil with various scenarios including normal strings, strings with leading and multiple internal whitespaces, strings with leading whitespace and stripLeading true, strings with only whitespace, and strings with invisible characters.
